titleStmt.title: A salutation in the love of God and in the fellowship of the work of His blessed truth ... with a word of exhortation and counsel ... also a warning unto all them that have long known the truth but have not, neither obey it with all their hearts ... / by Samuel Cater.
titleStmt.author: Cater, Samuel, d. 1711.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
